categories: Sutherlin Bay Slouch Mid Back Zip Boots
description: A busy schedule requires the right boot. Rich leather carries you from office meetings to dinner reservations, and a grippy rubber sole offers stability on rain-slicked train platforms. A cushy footbed makes hitting your daily step count much more enjoyable. The back zipper makes them easy to pull on when you’re running late.Premium full-grain leather upper.Slouchy styling.Back zip with leather pull.Leather-wrapped heel (4cm).OrthoLite® footbed provides cushioning and support.Rubber outsole is grippy and durable.
name: Timberland Sutherlin Bay Slouch Mid Back Zip Boots - Women's
